description:
gc: Better error message for range over non-receive channel.

Fixes issue 2354

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

Please add a test case to test/chan/perm.go.
Please also make the message look like the
one you'd get from x := <-c:

"invalid operation: range %N (receive from send-only type %T)"

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=27d7673713db ***

gc: Better error message for range over non-receive channel.

Fixes issue 2354

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5346044

subject: code review 5346044: gc: Better error message for range over non-receive channel.
